tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Removal of cysts in the oral cavity,
review: The staff and Dr. Rohit Yadav are welcoming and compassionate people. In terms of dentistry and patient care, he is incredibly capable, careful, and skilled. He performed surgery on me to remove a cyst. It was trouble- and stress-free. In order to improve his services, he also uses the most recent technologies. I would suggest Dr. Rohit Yadav because of his successful treatment, ************* *** well-trained personnel, and a mindset that emphasises attention to detail. In addition to treating me, he paid close attention to all of my questions. He frequently checks in on me. ** ** ****** *** ***** I really appreciate the care I received.
reply_text: Thank you Gunjan for being such a wonderful patient. Take care!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One tooth of mine was troubling me since many days..  But I kept on neglecting. I knew it has to be removed, but I was very scared because two of my family members had complications after tooth removal. After much wait and research, I visited Cusp Dental and met Dr Rohit Yadav. He explained me and motivated me for the procedure. Though, that fear was still there in my mind, but it had to be done. Thankfully, I didn't have any problem during or after the procedure. Thank you so much Dr Rohit for removing the mental block from my mind.
reply_text: Thank you Shelly for placing your trust in us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got one of my tooth extracted at my hometown. 3 to 4 days after it the extraction area started aching too much, it was really unbearable, I had to take 6 to 7 painkillers in a day. I searched on Google for a maxillofacial surgeon and visited cusp dental. Dr Rohit examined me and told me that it is a condition known as dry socket which needs multiple dressings to be done and it cannot be relieved only through medicines. He did dressings and slowly and gradually the pain kept on decreasing. Thank you so much Dr Rohit for relieving me of the agonising pain.
reply_text: Thank you Shubham for visiting us. You have been a wonderful patient to treat on!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My mother has lost many of her teeth over past years. But from one month, she could feel some swelling on inner side of her cheeks that would hinder and trouble her while eating food. We booked and online appointment with Dr Rohit Yadav. On video call, he looked and told that swelling was mostly fibroma due to missing teeth. He explained the procedure to remove it painlessly. The next day we visited his clinic. Considering my mother's age, I was very skeptical. But he performed the procedure very calmly and nicely. Thank you so much Doctor.
reply_text: Thank you Sir for believing in us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was using removable dentures since last 5 years. Though I was used to them but still they were not that comfortable and removing them daily was a hassle. My son went to Dr Rohit Yadav to enquire for some solution. There he came to know about Implant supported fixed dentures. The mere thought of getting fixed teeth made me super happy. We took an appointment with Dr Rohit and went to properly understand the whole treatment. After all the required scans and tests, the procedure was started for me. After 5 months, I got my own fixed teeth. Believe me, its like I got my natural teeth back. Thank you so much Dr Rohit. God bless you.
reply_text: Thank you Sir for such a wonderful feedback. It was such a delight treating you and seeing that million dollar smile on your face.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I delivered my baby 6 years back. After the delivery, I started feeling some increase in my chin area which kept on increasing slowly. I thought it to be related to pregnancy and avoided it. But then it started paining after a few years. It is then that I got it checked at the hospital and was advised to visit a Maxillofacial surgeon for the same. Google search took me to Dr Rohit Yadav. He examined and advised some scans and also did biopsy. The whole treatment was carried put by him in hospital setting with great ease and comfort. Thank you Doctor for all your support.
reply_text: Thank you Ma'am for your valuable feedback. Our utmost priority is the well being of all our patients. We try to give the best possible and affordable treatment to our patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was noticing a small swelling on the inside of my lower lip from quite few days though it was painless but it was a bit disturbing. So I visited Dr Rohit Yadav at Cusp Dental. He examined and told me that it is something known as mucocele, which required removal. He explained the procedure patiently and cleared all my doubts. I got the treatment done from him. The treatment was very comfortable. Post operative follow up was also taken care of. I highly recommend the doctor as well as the clinic.
reply_text: Thank you Preety for visiting us. Mucoceles tend to recur. Just make sure to get a regular dental checkup done every six months.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
One of the doctor removed my original tooth saying that it cannot be recovered. I went to cusp during my visit to Delhi for normal dental care. Then Dr rohit told me regarding mostly tooth can be recovered in such age using RCT. And then I had to get my dental implant done as my upper tooth was outgrowing. As of now  half procedure has been done. And I used to think how painful this surgery will be but trust me it was completely painless even after procedure was completed I haven't felt any pain since then.
Thank you Dr rohit. Will pay my next visit for remaining procedure. Will recommend Dr rohit to everyone looking for permanent dental implant and painless procedure.
reply_text: Thank you Kanika for such a wonderful feedback. Means a lot!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Most advanced prosthesis for missing tooth is Dental Implant. After consulting many surgeons I got satisfactory reason to get my fathers implant done from Dr Rohit Yadav. Dr Rohit apt to his name in this field is a highly skilled Surgeon. Implants are little intimidating as per the procedure and are also technique sensitive but because Dr Rohit explained and carried out the procedure with deftness and ease, not only the implant was great success but healing time was almost reduced to half. Clinic is suitable for all advanced procedures. Cusp Dental is must to visit for dental problems.
reply_text: Thank you Madhu Ma'am for such a wonderful feedback. Means a lot!

review: I was having cheek biting everytime while eating food for quite some time. Thought of getting a dental checkup done. Visited Dr Rohit Yadav. Again visited Dr Rohit, and got the treatment done. Now I think, why I waited for so long. Thank you Doctor.
